name: CNN
text: "We're not mourning for George Floyd. I don't think we or any of my staff are," the former CrossFit CEO said during a call hours before his controversial tweets Saturday referencing Floyd's death and Covid-19. "Can you tell me why I should mourn for him?" https://t.co/OenPBGHLuy

name: CNN
text:

In the days since George Floyd's death, two similar encounters have come to wider public attention. https://t.co/2GjhKAi2QZ

text:
